seo.title: Deepin  - Deepin Linux Operating System
seo.description: Provide a safe, reliable, beautiful and easy-to-use operating system to meet the different usage scenarios of global users and provide a better choose.

why.title: Why deepin?
why.content: Beautiful UI design, intimate human-computer interaction, and friendly community environment make you feel at home.

cards.title: Out of the box
cards.content: Deepin is easy to install and can meet your work needs without additional system configuration and software installation. You can configure deepin as you want, but it is not necessary - optimal settings and adjustments have been applied by default to meet the usage demands of most users.

cards.title: User-friendly
cards.content: The desktop environment based on the self-developed DTK has a beautiful UI, and the human-computer interaction is more in line with user habits, making you feel at home.

cards.title: Privacy Protection
cards.content: After system installation, everything is up to you. Photos, music, files, etc. are your personal data. We will not collect any of them. You can do whatever you want in deepin.

cards.title: Perfect Ecology
cards.content: Deepin not only develops a series of basic office software such as Music, Movie, Screen Capture, but also provides nearly 40,000 applications in App Store, which can run perfectly on deepin.

cards.title: Free and Open-source
cards.content: Our own technologies and open-source projects are based on Debian. Deepin follows the open-source rules and migrates almost all source code to GitHub. It is a completely free community edition. We do not charge any fees to users.

cards.title: Open and Sharing
cards.content: Our development, operation, products, and testing are closely linked to users. You can feed back your questions in deepin forums, Wechat, Telegram, and Twitter. Let's improve deepin together.

office.title: Practical and Effective Features
office.content: Deepin has developed over 40 applications based on user habits, making the office work more efficient and convenient!

cards.title: Free Working Style
cards.content: In deepin, you can enjoy not only the beautiful desktop environment, but also diversified working styles. No matter what kind of your working manner is, we can meet your needs. Deepin brings you a different experience.

cards.title: Grand Search
cards.content: No matter where your forgotten photos, videos and files are, Grand Search can help you quickly retrieve the content you want without rummaging through the huge disk space.

cards.title: Screen Capture
cards.content: It offers various capture methods for you to easily take screenshots in you daily work. When you watch interesting video sections, you can also record and share them without installing unnecessary applications.

cards.title: Mail
cards.content: If you have one or more mailboxes, how can you better arrange all events in your multiple emails? Mail supports the quick login of global mainstream e-mail accounts and synchronizes your schedule, so that you can better schedule your daily life.

production.title: Productivity Makes Life Better
production.content: Deepin App Store offers nearly 40,000 apps to satisfy all your needs in life and work.

cards.title: Office
cards.content: Quickly solve problems in work, effectively improve work efficiency, and make you better every moment.

cards.title: Entertainment
cards.content: Music and movies give us infinite possibilities and imagination, making our ordinary life sparkle.

cards.title: Design
cards.content: From 0 to 1, from the sketch to the final presentation of your idea, they make the impossible come true and the world a better place.

cards.title: Development
cards.content: Software development is the main force to promote human progress in this century, and also the source power for Linux long-term development. More and more deepin developers and users are the biggest driving force for us to build a perfect distribution.

cards.name: Stuart L.
cards.content: 哈喽My favorite thing about Pop_OS! Is that it literally gets out of your way and I can get so much work done without any problems. My favorite feature has to be the docker and the sweet animations!!!

cards.name: 小明
cards.content: When I first got my System76 laptop I decided I'd use Pop!_OS until it annoyed me, and would then switch to my distro-of-choice. Two years later not only am I still using it, it's become my distro-of-choice. It's radically cut how much time I spend hand-hacking configuration files, which gives me more time to spend on my projects

cards.name: Robert T.
cards.content: With minimal fiddling, Pop!_OS is a very capable, functional, and beautiful Linux distribution. It is still fully tweakable, but out of the box it just works. Really well!

cards.name: Amanda B.
cards.content: I am a high school science teacher, and while I do consider myself tech-savvy, I am not one to explore or experiment with different operating systems. I have been using Pop!_OS for several months now and I love it. It is very intuitive and user-friendly for the non-Linux user. Every tool I have needed has been available in the Pop Shop and those tools are easy to download, install, and use. Thank you for creating a Linux OS that is simple and approachable.
